# UIActivity.Category.action

**Case**

Activities whose primary purpose is to take an action on the selected item, like copying an image or saving it to the camera roll.

## Declaration

```swift
case action
```

## Constants

- **UIActivity.Category.share**: Activities whose primary purpose is to share the selected item, like sending an image by email.

items.description: Activities whose primary purpose is to share the selected item, like sending an image by email.
items.name: UIActivity.Category.share

title: UIActivity.Category.action
